page.title: 13A Day in the Life...a Mum
page.content: have set jobs to do on particular days.I work for two hours each morning and get home shortly after eleven o'clock. When I get home I start my housework. I mostly start by washing the clothes. I fill the washing machine,and set it going.While the clothes are being washed,I get on with other jobs like wiping down the worktops and cleaning the bathroom.By this time it is getting on for half past twelve,so I have a bite of lunch and a cup of coffee. When I have had my lunch,I wash the pots and then I clean and tidy upstairs.My last job is to clean and tidy the front room. I then like to have half an hour knitting,or reading,or in the garden, depending on the weather,before Paul comes home from school.
